channel.title: Comments on: Book Review: Inside the SQL Server Query Optimizer
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Phil Hegedusich
item.dc:creator: Phil Hegedusich
item.description: Thanks for the review, Jes. This subject has captured my undivided attention during my current project work, and I agree entirely that understanding index underpinnings is key to making that SQL rabbit run.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the review, Jes. This subject has captured my undivided attention during my current project work, and I agree entirely that understanding index underpinnings is key to making that SQL rabbit run.
